statements: UPDATE voice_commands SET command_description = 'Enable voice search' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE voice_commands SET command_action = 'Play music' WHERE command_name = 'play_song';
UPDATE voice_commands SET command_name = 'Play music', command_description = 'Plays music for entertainment', command_action = 'play' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE voice_commands SET command_action = 'pause', command_description = 'Pauses the current activity', command_name = 'Pause activity' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE voice_commands SET action='open' WHERE command_name='open door';
UPDATE indexes SET index_value='12345' WHERE index_name='voice_command';
UPDATE voice_commands SET command_name = 'New Command', action = 'New Action' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE indexes SET index_name = 'New Index', index_value = 'New Value' WHERE command_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE voice_commands SET command_name = 'New Command 1' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE voice_commands SET command_name = 'New Command Name', user_id = 1234, timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE users SET user_name = 'Updated User Name', email = 'updated_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE voice_commands SET command_text = 'New Text Value' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE voice_commands SET command_text = 'New command text' WHERE command_name = 'Open door';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', password_hash = 'newpasswordhash' WHERE username = 'johndoe';
UPDATE voice_commands SET command = 'New Command', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_profile SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE voice_commands SET command = 'Play Music', timestamp = now() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_profile SET phone_number = '+123456789', email = 'example@example.com' WHERE user_id = 5;
